price: 于数年之间。事前事后都归安拉所有。在那日，归信的人将要欢喜。
arabic: فِي بِضۡعِ سِنِينَۗ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ مِن قَبۡلُ وَمِنۢ بَعۡدُۚ وَيَوۡمَئِذٖ يَفۡرَحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: fī biḍ'ʿi sinīna lillahi al-amru min qablu wamin baʿdu wayawma-idhin yafraḥu al-mu'minūna
